messages.message: Spiky ice is bad for your health
Snow trolls don't like anyone, it's not personal
Dress in whatever you want or at least whatever you have
Jumping down from snowy cliffs is fine and fun
Keep moving to stay warm and to find more adventures
A giant snowball.  Too big to move, but cold enough to melt.
Oh my! It has been a long time since a star princess has visited us.
The last one who visited must have come before the mountain had frozen over.
You must be freezing!  Take my extra hat!
May the stars ever shine upon you!
